Class.name: VKReader.Requests.RequestSender
Class.Description: This class provides ability to send http-requests (actually https) to vk api server.

Parameter.name: SSLConfigurationName
Parameter.Description: Hold name of SSL configuration to use with https-request (set it to the one from your management portal).

Parameter.name: RequestTest
Parameter.Description: 0 => request made, no request printout. 1 => request printout, no request. 2 => request printout and request made. 3 => request made, no printout at all.

Method.name: SendHttpRequest
Method.Description: Send 'GET https://server/location?parametersString' request. Response is saved into responseText.
